tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ab_test_advertising (
    ad_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ad_name VARCHAR(255),
    creative_type VARCHAR(50),
    messaging TEXT,
    impressions INT,
    clicks INT,
    conversions INT
);

CREATE TABLE ab_test_results (
    test_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    creative_id INT NOT NULL,
    message_id INT NOT NULL,
    conversion_rate DECIMAL,
    test_date DATE
);
CREATE TABLE advertising_creatives (
    creative_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    creative_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    impression_count INT,
    click_count INT,
    conversion_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE ad_campaigns (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    budget DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE ad_results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT,
    creative_id INT,
    clicks INT,
    conversions INT,
    revenue DECIMAL(15,2)
);
CREATE TABLE Creative_A (creative_id INT PRIMARY KEY, headline VARCHAR(255), image_url VARCHAR(255), conversion_rate DECIMAL);
CREATE TABLE Creative_B (creative_id INT PRIMARY KEY, headline VARCHAR(255), image_url VARCHAR(255), conversion_rate DECIMAL);
CREATE TABLE Messaging_A (message_id INT PRIMARY KEY, message_text VARCHAR(255), message_type VARCHAR(50), click_through_rate DECIMAL);
CREATE TABLE Messaging_B (message_id INT PRIMARY KEY, message_text VARCHAR(255), message_type VARCHAR(50), click_through_rate DECIMAL);
CREATE TABLE Experiment_Results (experiment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, creative_id INT, message_id INT, conversion_rate DECIMAL, click_through_rate DECIMAL);
